post.body: I just hope it doesn't turn into freezing rain - yuck!
That's so funny! I just can't believe how much snow we've gotten this winter.
It's coming down pretty good right now, and swirling. It looks like a snowglobe out there! Everything's already white.
Congrats on the sale!
Oh I probably did with my luck! lol I finally was able to smell spicy salsa last night, the first thing I smelled in days! lol
Thanks! :)
Thanks :) I was feeling like a blind zombie the last few days, lol
I'm going to show DH when he comes home, I adore the one with the cat looking at the moon. The raven & cat one too begs 2 be mine
I think I need one of each of those :)
That's cute!
Oops! definitely not a good typo!
The cats are just fascinated at the window watching it come down right now, lol
oh you have GOT to be kidding me, it's snowing again!
Ok, off to start tackling the pile of laundry quick before it grows any bigger behind my back! lol
Did I say something offensive lately? lol I see I lost a bunch of followers, yikes! (I took a shower, I swear, I know I don't smell! lol)
Good afternoon everyone! I am feeling way better today, the foggy feeling is gone (yay!)
Allergies really bad :( Can't think I am sneezing so bad
I am sneezing like a banshee! I'm surprised my brains haven't come out, lol
Happy New Year to me... woke up with germies! Yuck! Here's hoping I don't pass it on!!
Almost to my 500th blog post!
